description: Partial approval of details application pursuant to condition 5 (Landscaping) - parts a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h and j, only, in relation to Phase 2 of planning consent ref: P2019/3572/S73 dated 28/07/2020.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: You are advised that this decision notice grants approval of parts a), b), c), d), e), f), g), h), and j) in relation to phase 2 of Condition 5 of planning permission Ref: P2019/3572/S73, dated 28/07/2020 only. 

Parts f), h), and i) relating to Phase 1 of Condition 5 were approved via application ref: P2020/0139/AOD, dated 10/07/2020. The details approved via this application were deemed to address all the required details for Phase 1 of the Central Foundation Boys' School landscaping scheme. 

You are advised that further details must be submitted in order to discharge part i) in relation to Phase 2 of condition 5 and in order to fully discharge condition 5.
